Description:
Merchant-assigned reference ID for the request.
If included in the request, this value is included in the response. This feature might be especially useful for multi-threaded applications.
This element contains a resultCode and one or more message elements.
States whether the request was handled successfully, or ended with an error.
Contains details about the result.

The code number for the result.
For a comprehensive list of possible values, or to look up a returned value, see the Response Code Tool.
Format: String, up to 6 characters.The first character is either an I for informational responses, or E for error responses. The remaining characters are numeric and indicate the type of informational or error response.

Description: Text explanation of the code for the result.
Contains payment information for the customer profile.

Designates whether this payment profile is set as the default payment profile.
This is returned only if you designated this profile as the default in the request.
Payment gateway assigned ID associated with the customer profile.
Payment gateway assigned ID associated with the customer payment profile.
Type of customer.

This element contains billing address information.
If EVO is your payment processor and you submit any of the following billTo fields, you must submit all of them.firstNamelastNameaddresscitystatezip

Conditional.First name associated with customer’s billing address.
Required only when using a European payment processor.

Conditional.Last name associated with customer’s billing address.
Required only when using a European payment processor.
Company associated with customer’s billing address.

Conditional.Customer’s billing address.
Required if merchant would like to use the Address Verification Service security feature.Required when using GPN Canada or Worldpay Streamline Processing Platform.

Conditional.City of customer’s billing address.
Required only when using a European payment processor.

Conditional.State of customer’s billing address.
Required only when using a European payment processor.
Format: String, up to 40 characters.For US states, use the USPS two-character abbreviation for the state.

Description:
Conditional.The postal code of customer’s billing address.
Required if merchant would like to use the Address Verification Service security feature.Required when using GPN Canada or Worldpay Streamline Processing Platform.
Country of customer’s billing address.
Format: String, up to 60 characters.For international payment processors, use the ISO 3166 alpha-2 code for the country.

Description: Phone number associated with customer’s billing address.
Fax number associated with customer’s billing address.
This element contains payment information.

Contains credit card payment information for the payment profile.
For information about the fields in this object, see the creditCard object in getCustomerPaymentProfileResponse

The customer’s masked credit card number.
All sensitive payment information in the output is masked.

The expiration date for the customer’s credit card.
All sensitive payment information in the output is masked unless you set unmaskExpirationDate to true in the request. When masked, expirationDate will return as "XXXX".
Type of credit card.
Format: String.Either Visa, Mastercard, AmericanExpress, Discover, JCB, or DinersClub.

Description: Unique identifier (IIN) for the issuer of the card. This element is only returned if you set the includeIssuerInfo field to true in the request.
Indicates whether the payment method used an encrypted token.

Conditional.Applies to eCheck.Net transactions only.
For more details please see the eCheck.Net API Documentation.

The type of bank account used for the eCheck.Net transaction.
The value of accountType must be valid for the echeckType value submitted.For more details please see the eCheck.Net API Documentation.
The ABA routing number.
The bank account number.
Name of the person who holds the bank account.

The type of eCheck transaction.
Do not use TEL, ARC, or BOC for recurring charges.
The name of the bank.
Contains one or more subscriptionId fields.
Contains a subscription ID associated with this customer.

Required.
The network transaction ID returned in response to the original card-on-file transaction.

Required.
The original authorization amount.
Format: Decimal, up to 15 digits with a decimal point.Required for Discover, Diners Club, JCB, and China Union Pay transactions.Do not use currency symbols.

Description:
Indicates whether the payment profile should be excluded from Account Updater updates.
This field is only included in the response if the payment profile is updated with excludeFromAccountUpdater set to true.
